##
## COMMON FRAMES WITH DATA
##

### Frame 01 ### - with description verified across the datastreams

0x00 00000000 # FLAGS - MODE WORD 2:
#    + AIR METER PULSE OCCURRED: Clear
#     + HIGH BATTERY VOLTAGE: Clear
#      + DIAGNOSTIC SWITCH IN ALDL POSITION (10K): Clear
#       + DIAG SWITCH IN DIAG POSITION (Shorted): Clear
#        + DIAGNOSTIC SWITCH IN FACTORY TEST (3.9K): Clear
#         + REFERENCE PULSE OCCURRED: Clear
#          + ESC FAILURE: Clear
#           + ROAD SPEED PULSE OCCURRED: Clear
0x01 00001010 # ECM ID part 1: 0A
0x02 11101010 # ECM ID part 2: EA
0x03 10010110 # IAC Present Position (steps): 150
0x04 01010001 # Coolant Temp (Deg C) [=N*.8-40]: 24.80
0x05 00000000 # Vehicle Speed (MPH): 0
0x06 00000000 # Load (%DC): 0
0x07 00000000 # Engine Speed (RPM) [=N*25]: 0
0x08 00010100 # Throttle Position (Volts) [=N*.0196]: 0.39
0x09 10000000 # Integrator (counts): 128
0x0A 01110001 # O2 (mV) [=N*4.44]: 501.72
0x0B 00000000 # FLAGS - MALFUNCTION FLAG WORD 1:
#    + C12 NO REFERENCE PULSES: Clear
#     + C13 OXYGEN SENSOR OPEN: Clear
#      + C14 COOLANT SENSOR HIGH TEMPERATURE: Clear
#       + C15 COOLANT SENSOR LOW TEMPERATURE: Clear
#        + C21 THROTTLE POSITION SENSOR HIGH: Clear
#         + C22 THROTTLE POSITION SENSOR LOW: Clear
#          + C23 AIR TEMPERATURE SENSROR CIRCUIT OPEN (or low temp): Clear
#           + C24 OPEN OR GROUNDED VEHICLE SPEED SENSOR: Clear
0x0C 00100000 # FLAGS - MALFUNCTION FLAG WORD 2:
#    + C25 AIR TEMPERATURE SENSOR CIRCUIT SHORTED (or high temp): Clear
#     + C31 WASTEGATE SIGNAL OPEN OR GROUNDED: Clear
#      + C32 EGR (Exhaust Gas Recirculation) DIAGNOSTICS: Set
#       + C33 MAF SENSOR HIGH: Clear
#        + C34 MAF SENSOR LOW: Clear
#         + C35 IAC (Idle Air Control) Actuator: Clear
#          + C41 CAM SENSOR FAILURE: Clear
#           + C42 OPEN EST OR BYPASS CIRCUIT TO ECM: Clear
0x0D 00000000 # FLAGS - MALFUNCTION FLAG WORD 3:
#    + C43 ESC (Electronic Spark Control) FAILURE: Clear
#     + C44 OXYGEN SENSOR LEAN: Clear
#      + C45 OXYGEN SENSOR RICH: Clear
#       + C51 PROM ERROR: Clear
#        + C52 CAL PACK MISSING: Clear
#         + C53 N/A: Clear
#          + C54 N/A: Clear
#           + C55 FAULTY ECM: Clear
0x0E 00000000 # FLAGS - AIR-FUEL (A/F) MODE WORD:
#    + Loop Status: Open
#     + Rich/Lean: Lean
#      + First Time Closed Loop: No
#       + N/A
#        + Prop Step: Lean
#         + N/A
#          + CRUISE BLM (Block Learn Control): Disabled
#           + Cranked in CLEAR FLOOD FLAG: Clear
0x0F 00000011 # MAF (Grams/Sec): 3
0x10 11100001 # FLAGS - MCU STATUS WORD:
#    + A/C: Requested
#     + 4th Gear Switch: Open
#      + 3rd Gear Switch: Open
#       + Water Injector: Off
#        + Power Steering Switch: No
#         + TCC: Unlocked
#          + Cruise Control: Disabled
#           + PARK/NEUTRAL MODE: Set
0x11 00000000 # Knock Counter (counts): 0
0x12 10000000 # BLM Block Learn Multiplier (count): 128
0x13 00000000 # Rich/Lean Transition Count (transitions) [N-prevN<0 ? N+255-prevN : N-prevN]: 0
0x14 00000000 # Spark Advance (Knock Retard) (deg): 0
0x15 01101100 # Air Temp (?): 105.08
0x16 01111100 # Battery Voltage (V): 12.4
0x17 00000001 # Counter since No Malfunctions (counts): 1
0x18 00000000 # EGR Duty Cycle (DC): 0
